title: My Baby Is Having a Baby
overview: Teen motherhood is a fact of contemporary life and an experience faced by an ever growing number of families.Fresh, insightful and emotionally charged, My Baby Is Having a Baby is a new and unique multigenerational take on this life changing experience told from the POV of the new grandmother as well as the teen mom. Over six months, we follow six families as they deal with births, babies, relationships, finances and graduating high school. Each episode deals with the dramatic realities of teenage motherhood faced by a teen and her mom.Uniquely, My Baby Is Having a Baby covers the maternal relationships of teen motherhood over three generations. We explore not just the grandmother's and mother's relationship with the newborn baby, but also their relationship as mother and daughter survives, prospers and flourishes through this life-changing period.
